thread.title: Pettiford's grab propels Patriots past Golden Bears
thread.title_full: Pettiford's grab propels Patriots past Golden Bears

title: Pettiford's grab propels Patriots past Golden Bears
text:
Pettiford's grab propels Patriots past Golden Bears 
By wbng sports October 24, 2015 Updated Oct 24, 2015 at 12:06 AM EDT 
Binghamton, NY (WBNG Binghamton) Rasheen Pettiford out-leaped a Vestal defender, came down with the jump ball and scored with just over 1 minute remaining to help lift Binghamton past Vestal, 14-7. 
The Patriots (6-2) finished the regular season as the No. 2 seed in Class AA and will host Corning in a sectional semifinal matchup. 
WBNG E-News - Sign Up For Our Newsletter! 
Vestal (4-4) will travel to Johnson City in the Class A semifinals. 
Union-Endicott 38, Horseheads 7 : Union-Endicott blew the doors off Horseheads, 38-7, to earn its second win of the season. The Tigers (2-6) travel to Maine-Endwell in the Class A semifinals. 
Maine-Endwell 52, Ithaca 20 : Maine-Endwell completed another perfect regular season, handling Ithaca at home Friday night. 
The Spartans, winners of a state record 59 straight games, host Union-Endicott in the Class A sectional semifinals. 
Elmira 51, Johnson City 16 : Elmira capped a perfect season with a blowout road win over the Wildcats.
